document_title: RKVY Agribusiness Incubator (R-ABI) under RKVY Scheme
objective: Promote agripreneurship and start-ups, support agribusiness incubation by tapping innovations and technologies for promotion of agri-startups and for venture creation in agriculture.
benefits: Thrust on promoting agripreneurship and start-ups
how_to_apply: Submit proposal in the prescribed proforma available at Annexure II, III and IV of Scheme Guidelines
Submit proposal on the Portal of RKVY
notes: RKVY supports agribusiness incubation by tapping innovations and technologies for promotion of agri-startups and for venture creation in agriculture.
